title: Enterprise AI CRM Orchestrator
description: A scalable orchestrator for enterprise CRM systems, integrating LLMs for automated customer support.
long_description: Designed and built a high-throughput orchestration layer that routes customer queries to specialized AI agents. Handled context management, rate limiting, and fallback to human agents. Built with Python (FastAPI), Redis for state, and LangChain for LLM flow control.

title: Local AI Companion Framework
description: A privacy-focused framework for running personal AI assistants locally on consumer hardware.
long_description: Developed a modular framework to deploy and manage quantized LLMs locally. Features include a plugin system for deskop integration, memory management for long-term context, and a strictly local-first data policy.

title: 3D Learning Prototype
description: Interactive 3D environment for spatial learning and visualization experiments.

title: RPGMZ Video Plugin
description: Plugin for RPG Maker MZ extending video playback capabilities for interactive storytelling.

title: Generative AI Research Experiments
description: A collection of experiments in generative art, audio synthesis, and style transfer.
